scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:copy-files && npm run build:db:push
scripts.build:compile: npm run setenv -- npx gaudi-cli build
scripts.build:db:push: npm run setenv -- npx gaudi-cli db push
scripts.build:db:reset: npm run setenv -- npx gaudi-cli db reset
scripts.dev: npm run dev:prepare; concurrently --names BUILD,COPY,MIGR,RUN --prefix-colors blue,yellow,magenta,cyan "npm run dev:compile" "npm run dev:copy-files" "npm run dev:db:push" "npm run dev:start"
scripts.dev:start: if [ -f './dist/definition.json' ]; then npm start; else chokidar ./dist/definition.json --command "if [[ '{event}' == 'add' ]]; then npm start; fi;"; fi;
scripts.start: npm run setenv -- nodemon --watch ./node_modules/@gaudi/engine/runtime --watch ./dist --exec "npx gaudi-cli run"
scripts.populate: npm run setenv -- npx gaudi-cli db populate --populator Dev
